channel.title: Need help with adding ::pickup

item.title: Need help with adding ::pickup
item.dc:creator: @livingpro livingpro
item.description:
@livingpro wrote:

when i try adding

    if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) {
	        String[] arg = playerCommand.split(" ");
         if (arg.length == 3); {
		int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(arg[1]);
		int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(arg[2]);
		if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) {
			addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("No such item.");
		}

to commands it comes up with

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:143: cannot find symbol symbol : method addItem(int,int) location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

please help me fix this. thank you!

Read full topic
